name: Newspaper Boy
description:
Deliver newspapers to all house entrances!

Game created for internal The Knights Of Unity "Tost Game Jam" by:

Emilka Fila - art, design
Piotrek Stoch - code, music, design, sounds

Important: In package you'll find three different versions - for keyboard, ps4 gamepad and XOne gamepad. These versions differs only in input.

Important 2: Game was designed for gamepad, but keyboard and mouse is also quite good ;)

Have fun :D
